title: How to Use - Progress Tracker
objectiveText: This site helps you track your study progress, whether it's material pages or exercise questions. Monitor your progress in real-time!
howItWorksText: By setting the range (e.g., from 1 to 50), the site creates buttons. As you progress, you click the buttons to mark what you've completed, and the tracker updates automatically.
exampleText: If you're reading a book and are on page 20, set 'Start' to 1 and 'End' to 50. As you go on, mark the buttons of the pages you've read, and the 'completed' counter will be updated.
